damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: Maulerfiends are ferocious Daemon Engines capable of scaling even sheer fortress walls with their wicked metal talons. Those employed by the Thousand Sons are inescapable, for the daemons within them hunt as much by tracking their preyâ€™s future choices as by the lights of their soulspoor.

faction: Prophetic Hunters: You can target this unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP
and can do so even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.
